Name: OLI_RELDESC_ACCTSPEC
Definition: Account Specialist is the carrier employee responsible for administering the group insurance customer's case information. The group insurance customer is the employer organization or company, and their case information includes such items as contacts, situs information, and Experience Groupings.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_ADMINUNIT
Definition: An organization responsible for the administration of a particular product or some other aspect of a customer relationship.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_ADOPTIVEBROTHER
Definition: Brother in an adoptive family. This is typically a natural male child or another adopted male child of a set of adoptive parents that becomes the brother of an adopted child once the adoption is complete.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_ADOPTIVESISTER
Definition: Sister in an adoptive family. This is typically a natural female child or another adopted female child of a set of adoptive parents that becomes the sister of an adopted child once the adoption is complete.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_AUNTINLAW
Definition: Aunt-in-law.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_BENADMIN
Definition: Benefits Administrator is the group insurance customer's representative designated as the individual or organization who administers the benefit plan being purchased from the carrier and offered to the employee population.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_COMPANION
Definition: Relates the companion holding to the associated holding

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FEMCOUSIN
Definition: When used in non-English language context, this implies a female cousin. In English speaking context, no gender is implied.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_COUSIN
Definition: When used in non-English language context, this implies a male cousin. In English speaking context, no gender is implied.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_DAYCONTACT
Definition: Day-to-day Contact is the group insurance customer's representative designated as the individual to be contacted for any questions or normal activity requirements around the management of the relationship between the carrier and the customer. The group insurance customer is the employer organization or company, and the Day-to-day contact is generally an individual rather than an organization, but exceptions to that do exist.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_EXTERNAL
Definition: This is the general term for an External Replacement.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FINPURCH
Definition: The policy is being replaced as a result of a Finance Purchase.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMAL
Definition: Relates the formal holding to the associated holding.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERBROTHERINLAW
Definition: A previous brother-in-law during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a sibling.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERDAUGHTRINLAW
Definition: A previous daughter-in-law during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a son.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERFATHERINLAW
Definition: A previous father-in-law during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a spouse.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERMOTHERINLAW
Definition: A previous mother-in-law during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a spouse.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSISTERINLAW
Definition: A previous sister-in-law during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a sibling.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSONINLAW
Definition: A previous son-in-law during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a daughter.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSTEPBROTHER
Definition: A previous step brother during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a parent.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSTEPDAUGHTER
Definition: A previous step daughter during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a spouse.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSTEPFATHER
Definition: A previous husband of one's mother during one's lifetime, other than one's father, typically following the divorce or death of the father.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSTEPMOTHER
Definition: A previous wife of one's father during one's lifetime, other than one's mother, typically following the divorce or death of the mother.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSTEPSISTER
Definition: A previous step sister during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a parent.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_FORMERSTEPSON
Definition: A previous step son during one's lifetime, typically following the divorce or death of a spouse.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_GRANDDAUGHTERINLAW
Definition: The wife of one's grandson.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_GRANDNEPHEWINLAW
Definition: The son of one's nephew or niece, grandson of one's sister or brother.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_GRANDNIECEINLAW
Definition: The daughter of one's nephew/niece, granddaughter of one's sister or brother.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_GRANDSONINLAW
Definition: The husband of one's granddaughter.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_GROUPCONV
Definition: The replaced policy is from a group conversion.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_GPO
Definition: The policy is being replaced as a result of a Guaranteed Purchase Option.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_HALF_BROTHER
Definition: Have one parent in common. For example, same mother, different fathers.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_HALF_SISTER
Definition: Have one parent in common. For example, same mother, different fathers.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_INFORMAL
Definition: Relates the informal holding to the associated holding.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_INTERNAL
Definition: This is the general term for an Internal Replacement.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_NEPHEWINLAW
Definition: The son of one's sister-in-law or brother-in-law; husband of one's niece.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_NIECEINLAW
Definition: The daughter of one's sister-in-law/brother-in-law; wife of one's nephew.

Description: Owner of Cash Value and Death Benefit
Name: OLI_RELDESC_OWNERCVDB
OLI_RELDESC_DIFFCO
Definition: The policy is being replaced between statutory companies.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_SAMECO
Definition: The policy being replaced was issued by the same statutory company.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_SELF
Definition: Identifies that information relates back to Party. An example is gathering household insurance information for RISK for the proposed insured, since RISK links back to PARTY.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_SPECCAREAGENCY
Definition: Agency assigned to work with the contact(s) of the deceased client and provide an additional level of service or care.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_SPECCAREAGENT
Definition: Agent assigned to work with the contact(s) of the deceased client and provide an additional level of service or care.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPAUNT
Definition: The sister of one's stepmother or stepfather or the stepsister of one's mother or father.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPBROTH
Definition: Have no blood relations, different parents, however parents are married to each other.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPBROTHERINLAW
Definition: The step brother of one's spouse or the husband of one's step sister.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPDAUGH
Definition: A daughter of one's husband or wife by a former partner.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPDAUGHTERINLAW
Definition: The daughter of one's wife by a former husband, or of one's husband by a former wife.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPFATHERINLAW
Definition: The stepfather of one's spouse.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPGRANDDAUGHTER
Definition: The daughter of one's stepchild, or the stepdaughter of one's child.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPGRANDFATHER
Definition: The stepfather of one's mother or father.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPGRANDMOTHER
Definition: The stepmother of one's mother or father.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPGRANDSON
Definition: The son of one's stepchild, or the stepson of one's child.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPMOTHERINLAW
Definition: The stepmother of one's spouse.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPNEPHEW
Definition: The son of one's stepbrother/sister, or stepson of one's brother/sister.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPNIECE
Definition: The daughter of one's stepbrother/sister, or stepdaughter of one's brother/sister.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPSIST
Definition: Have no blood relations, different parents, however parents are married to each other.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPSISTERINLAW
Definition: The step sister of one's spouse or the wife of one's step brother.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPSON
Definition: A son of one's husband or wife by a former partner.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPSONINLAW
Definition: The son of one's wife by a former husband, or of one's husband by a former wife.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_STEPUNCLE
Definition: The brother of one's stepmother or stepfather. The stepbrother of one's mother or father.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_SUPERSEDED
Definition: The applied for holding has been superseded by a subsequent holding.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_TERMCONV
Definition: The policy is being replaced as a result of a Term Conversion.

Name: OLI_RELDESC_UNCLEINLAW
Definition: Uncle-in-law.
